H0.text: where are the hormones of the anterior pituitary created. The Hypothalamic-Pituitary Axis

H1.text: where are the hormones of the anterior pituitary created. The Thyroid Gland

H2.text: where are the hormones of the anterior pituitary created. The Adrenal Glands

H3.text: where are the hormones of the anterior pituitary created. The pars distalis

A4.text: The pars distalis (distal part) comprises the majority of the anterior pituitary and is where the bulk of pituitary hormone production occurs.

A5.text: These cells all together produce hormones of the anterior pituitary and release them into the blood stream.
